Package scenegraph

Class Blendshape

  • java.lang.Object
    • scenegraph.AbstSceneObject
      • scenegraph.AbstMeshData
        • scenegraph.Blendshape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ChannelInterface
    public class Blendshape
extends AbstMeshData
    Class for blend shape deforming (morphing). A blend shape takes a base mesh and blends it with other target meshes based on weight values. The base mesh is the mesh to be deformed; it will change its form as the targets and weight parameters are modified. The base mesh has a list of target meshes that effect its shape. Each target is associated with a weight value. When the weight value increases, the target has more influence on the base mesh. The base mesh and its targets need to have identical vertex counts. The blended object is a combination of N targets (the sum of the base mesh and the weighted differences between base mesh and each target).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ursula Derichs

    • Constructor Detail

      • Blendshape

        public Blendshape​(AbstMeshData baseMesh,
                  int numTargets,
                  AbstMeshData[] targets)
        Constructor. The base mesh and the target meshes are stored. For each target the delta between the base mesh and the target mesh is calculated and the channels to the weights are created.
        Parameters:
        baseMesh - base mesh for the blend shape
        numTargets - number of target meshes
        targets - field of target meshes
